definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

to scale (a height)/to ascend/to mount/to publish or record/to enter (e.g. in a register)/to press down with the foot/to step or tread on/to put on (shoes or trousers) (dialect)/to be gathered and taken to the threshing ground (old)

sentences.english: Their names are Austin and Haiden.
sentences.chinese: 他们的名字是奥斯汀和海登。

sentences.english: Hayden grabbed his gym bag, and we raced downstairs.
sentences.chinese: 海登拿起他的运动包和我一起跑到楼下。

sentences.english: Austin is ten and Haiden is five.
Goodness, Hayden, I didn’t know you had a big toe.
sentences.chinese: 海登，我一点儿也不知道你也有一个大拇趾。

sentences.english: And the Cambodians have actually controlled the Hayden Planetarium from their high school.
sentences.chinese: 柬埔寨人通过他们的高中实际上可以控制海登天文馆。

sentences.english: He was right. It even had an official-looking logo.
sentences.chinese: 海登是对的，报纸上还有官方的标识。
海登长吸了一口气，停止数数。

definition: Hofmann or Hoffman (name)/August Wilhelm von Hofmann (1818-1892), German chemist/Dustin Hoffman (1937-), US film actor
